text: Is there a way to copy the output of `pretty_table` from the `PrettyTables` pacakge? I created this nice table of my simulation results (with a lot of manual code) and now I would like to copy/paste this table into a Google Doc or Excel

elements.text: Is there a way to copy the output of
pacakge? I created this nice table of my simulation results (with a lot of manual code) and now I would like to copy/paste this table into a Google Doc or Excel

text: Can we cross post this publicly to <https://discourse.julialang.org|Discourse> for further visibility? React with :bridge: on the message above to approve. <https://github.com/JuliaCommunity/SlackBridge/blob/main/README.md#faq|More info here>

Success, it has been cross posted <https://discourse.julialang.org/t/56421| to Discourse>. Keep and eye out on Discourse for responses and please add an answer there once you are satisfied with the solution so others can benefit as well. Happy debugging!

I dont think so. The formatting won't be preserved if you have a nicely formatted table.

But there is <https://github.com/JuliaActuary/ActuaryUtilities.jl>, which allows you to take data and put it in the clipboard

text:
You can output to html... but im not sure how well you can convert to excel after that.

You should use latex!
